name: Touhou Theme
description:
Nice touhou style for OLD youtube layout

Remade Version for NEW youtube layout by Jake Blade:
https://userstyles.org/styles/175060/touhou-theme-fixed
-Not as good, but it works ;)

*Touhou is not anime Awooo*
FAQ:
***How to restore old youtube layout?***
NEW  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pelQmYW0zkg

***How to change background or chat background for the one i prefer?***
     1. Go to https://imgur.com/upload and upload you image
               - hover your cursor on "▽" icon in top right corner and click "Get share link" Copy the  BBCode one without [img] [/img]
     2. Go to youtube site
     3. Click on Stylish icon > Installed > find this style > click on pencil "✎EDIT" icon
     4. Change imgur link where /* YOUTUBE BACKGROUND */ or /* CHAT BACKGROUND */ 
                 comments are
     5. Click Save on the left
     6. DONE, you made it (It will restore to default if you update/reinstall style)

If you have any problem add me on discord: ༻Staruu༺#9050

user.name: Stargazer
user.about: I'm just a common guy, who  always sits on youtube  and I wants youtube to look nice ;)

obsoletion_message: Youtube is fighting against old, better layout. They are so dumb :)

discussions.name: This style only works in old youtube layout
